Name: USCoreDocumentReferenceType
Title: US Core DocumentReference Type
Descriptino: The US Core DocumentReference Type Value Set includes all LOINC values whose SCALE is "Doc" in the LOINC database and the HL7 v3 Code System NullFlavor concept 'unknown'

Name: CDexPOUCodes
Title: CDex Purpose of Use Value Set
Descriptino: The set of purpose of use (POU) codes for requesting data. This code set is composed of [FHIR core Purpose of Use security labels](http://hl7.org/fhir/security-labels.html#core) and additional codes defined by this Guide.

Name: CDexClaimUseCodes
Title: CDex Claim Use Value Set
Descriptino: The purpose of a Claim resource and the reason for attachments. It includes the codes "preauthorization" and "claim".

Name: CDexDataRequestTaskCode
Title: CDex Data Request Task Code Value Set
Descriptino: Codes used to identify the type of data request. It includes the codes “data-request-query”, “data-request-code”, and “data-request-questionnaire”.

Name: CDexIdentifierTypes
Title: CDex Identifier Types Value Set
Descriptino: Identifier types for providers and organizations. It includes the codes “TAX” and “NPI”.

Name: CDexLOINCAttachmentCodesValueSet
Title: CDex LOINC Attachment Codes Value Set
Descriptino: This value set includes LOINC terms that can be sent by a payer as part of an HL7 attachment request for additional information. It has been curated by the HL7 Payer/Provider Information Exchange (PIE) Work Group.  More information about using LOINC in HIPAA attachments and the source of this value set can be found at [LOINC Attahments](https://loinc.org/attachments/).

Name: CDexPWK01AttachmentReportTypeCodeValueSet
Title: CDex PWK01 Attachment Report Type Code Value Set
Descriptino: In addition to using LOINC attachment codes, a payer may request for additional information from the provider to support a prior authorization request using X12's PWK01 Attachment Report Type Code.  Note that the PWK01 codes will not be published in due to X12 IP restrictions.

Name: CDexWorkQueueCodes
Title: CDex Work Queue Value Set
Descriptino: The set work queue tags that the provider may use in their workflow to process requests. This code set is composed of codes defined by this Guide.

Name: HRexTaskStatus
Title: HRex Task Status ValueSet
Descriptino: The set of task codes allowed for use in HRex data request tasks

Name: PASTaskCodes
Title: PAS Task Codes
Descriptino: The code for the task that is request additional information.
